reviews.text: Agave and Rye is a chain from NKY, so I love seeing them up here. They've got two locations in town, but we went to this one because some of our friends had...

Overall 7.3/10, I would go back if someone else paid.

There were 2 spots that you could pay and park adjacent to the restaurant. There is a valet for the...
It's a really cool place.  The drinks were good.  The tacos were big.  2 should do it.  The staff is awesome and know the menu and definitely point you in...
